function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stacking of workforce trades","Impact":"Increase risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement scheduling and logistical changes to prevent crowded workspaces","Technologies":"Scheduling software, remote communication tools","People":"Workforce, trade employees","Owner":"Management, HR department"},{"Description":"Unclean surfaces of service and fleet vehicles","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and use of aerosol sanitizers","Technologies":"Cleaning equipment, aerosol sanitizers","People":"Vehicle operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Fleet management, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Management of sick employees","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease spread in the workplace","Mitigation":"Encourage sick employees to stay home, separate sick employees, communicate HR practices","Technologies":"Communications tools, remote working software","People":"Employees, management, HR department","Owner":"Management, HR department"}]}
